## \_sortByDate() function

Sort an array of objects by a date property

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _sortByDate<T extends {}>(collection: Maybe<ImmutableArray<T>>, prop: Prop<Immutable<T>>, direction?: "asc" | "desc"): Maybe<Immutable<T>[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  collection | Maybe&lt;ImmutableArray&lt;T&gt;&gt; | An array of objects |
|  prop | Prop&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;&gt; | A date property on the object |
|  direction | "asc" \| "desc" | A sorting direction |

<b>Returns:</b>

Maybe&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;\[\]&gt;
